body:
School enchantment (compulsion) [mind-affecting]

Level bard 4, druid 4, inquisitor 4, sorcerer/wizard 5, summoner 5, witch 5

Duration 1 round/level

Saving Throw Will negates

Spell Resistance yes

Target Restrictions selected

This effect word functions as the paralyze humanoid word except that it can affect creatures of any type.
name: Paralyze Creature
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Effect Words/Binding Words/Paralyze Creature
